artist: Artist: Miguel Covarrubias; Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Printer: The Harbor Press, New York
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: dull red Morocco, gold-stamped lettering, marbled paper sides; endpapers: white wove; slip case: grey paper over cardboard, stamped lettering in blue; type: Linotype Devinne; 348 pp.
provenance: Dorothy Millett Lindeke, Wayzata, Minn.; Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke; given to MIA, 1987.
title: Uncle Tom's Cabin; or Life Among the Lowly
